评论概述: Fun Cardigan to Wear to a 1950's Themed Party!
评论详情: Hip Hop 50's shop make quality products.  This sweater/cardigan is certainly one of them.  Product came well packaged, nice and neat. Great fit. True to size.  Well constructed, clean finish. Love the lettering, stripes, the ribbed texture of the sweater and the feel of the knitted material.  The buttons are big and bold. Husband will have fun wearing this to the Grease-themed party!  This is a reputable seller and highly recommend them.
